sections.title: What happens at an implant consultation?
sections.body: We assess your mouth, dental history, and medical factors, carry out imaging or CBCT scans if indicated, and map options such as single implants, implant-retained dentures, or full-arch approaches — including staged versus same-day routes where suitable. The focus is understanding and planning, not rushing into treatment.
bullets: Scan-led planning to understand your starting point
Suitability checks for single, multiple, or full-arch implants
Personalised plan and costed estimate after assessment

sections.title: Who is this appointment for?
items: Missing one tooth, several teeth, or all teeth
Nervous patients wanting a calmer approach
Anyone unsure whether implants are possible
If implants aren’t high standards option for you, we’ll explain alternatives clearly

faqs.question: Am I suitable for dental implants?
faqs.answer: Suitability is confirmed after a full assessment, including scans where needed, so recommendations match your health and goals.

faqs.question: Do I need a CBCT scan?
faqs.answer: A CBCT scan is recommended when it improves safety and planning clarity; we explain why before proceeding.

faqs.question: How long does implant treatment take?
faqs.answer: Timelines depend on healing, bone quality, and the type of restoration. We outline likely stages after your assessment.

faqs.question: Can I have sedation if I’m nervous?
faqs.answer: Sedation options can be discussed and assessed for suitability. We prioritise calm, no-pressure planning.

faqs.question: What are the alternatives to implants?
faqs.answer: If implants aren’t high standards fit, we talk through alternatives such as bridges or dentures so you can choose confidently.

faqs.question: Can I have temporary teeth while healing?
faqs.answer: Interim solutions may be possible depending on your plan. We cover options during consultation and planning.

faqs.question: How long do implants last?
faqs.answer: Implants are intended as long-term solutions, but longevity depends on bone health, home care, and attending reviews.

faqs.question: How much does an implant consultation cost?
faqs.answer: Fees are confirmed after we understand your needs and any scans required, with transparent estimates provided in writing.

faqs.question: Will I get a written plan?
faqs.answer: Yes. After assessment you receive a personalised plan with options, timelines, and costs to review at your own pace.

faqs.question: What happens after the consultation?
faqs.answer: You have time to consider the plan. If you proceed, we schedule treatment and guide you through preparation and aftercare.
